meanings.definition: Having both male and female reproductive organs on the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The monecious frog can fertilize its own eggs.
meanings.sent2: The monecious flower can pollinate itself.
meanings.sent3: It's quite convenient to be a monecious creature!
meanings.sent4: The monecious tree is a true marvel of nature.
meanings.sent5: The monecious nature of the organism is truly fascinating.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a plant that has both male and female reproductive structures on the same plant.
meanings.sent1: The monecious plant can self-pollinate easily.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was amazed by the monecious crop in his field.
meanings.sent3: The monecious plant seemed to be quite the multitasker!
meanings.sent4: The garden was full of monecious plants, a harmonious sight.
meanings.sent5: The monecious plant's ability to reproduce efficiently is impressive.
